General.Name: OSK Ventures International Bhd
General.Description: OSK Ventures International Berhad, an investment holding company, provides venture capital and private equity services in Malaysia and internationally. The company offers private equity capital for companies, including commercialized start-ups and late-stage companies. It is involved in the investment in public equities; management of investments in securities of venture companies; money lending activities; and management of private funds and holding of long-term investments. In addition, the company offers expansionary capital, mezzanine financing, start-up companies, and venture debt services. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. OSK Ventures International Berhad is a subsidiary of OSK Equity Holdings Sdn. Bhd.
